I am a soil scientist studying biogeochemical (carbon and nitrogen) dynamics in terrestrial ecosystems across temporal and spatial scales. 
My work focuses on soil and ecosystem responses to environmental change and disturbances such as ecosystem acidification, shifting moisture regimes, and warming winters.
